name: Balance (itch) (Games made by a 15 Year old)
name_original: Balance (itch) (Games made by a 15 Year old)
description:
Logic and Creativity are two halves of the same coin. Both of them create what we call complete balance. In this chaotic reality called life, how long can you keep up this balance?  Your objective is to survive for as long as you can while collecting puzzle pieces using the LOGICAL left side of your brain while collecting musical notes using your CREATIVE right side of your brain.

this is my first attempt at game design and publishing and all comments , criticism, and reviews are welcome. Thanks for stopping by !!!
developers: Games made by a 15 Year old
